Title: I Hear You Knocking
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Kyle Arrington, L.J. Smith (based in part on the character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries" novels by)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Phoebe Tonkin, Charles Michael Davis
Plot: After being marked by The Hollow's dark magic, Klaus and Marcel experience the symptoms of a malevolent haunting. Meanwhile, Hayley and Elijah head out to speak with Mary.
